statements: SELECT * FROM baseball_stadiums;
SELECT stadium_name, location, capacity FROM baseball_stadiums;
SELECT stadium_name, attendance_numbers FROM baseball_stadiums WHERE tickets_sold > 50000;
SELECT * FROM baseball_stadiums ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT stadium_name, location, capacity, fan_demographics FROM baseball_stadiums;
SELECT * FROM baseball_stadiums WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT stadium_name, location, capacity FROM baseball_stadiums WHERE tickets_sold > 50000;
SELECT stadium_id, stadium_name, location FROM baseball_stadiums WHERE attendance_numbers BETWEEN 50000 AND 70000 ORDER BY stadium_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM baseball_stadiums WHERE fan_demographics->'age' = '25-35' AND fan_demographics->'gender' = 'Male';
SELECT stadium_name, tickets_sold, attendance_numbers, fan_demographics->'location' AS fan_location FROM baseball_stadiums WHERE capacity > 40000 ORDER BY tickets_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE game_id = 100;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM fan_demographics WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price, seat_number FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP';
SELECT * FROM fan_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT game_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets_sold FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY game_id ORDER BY total_tickets_sold DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT game_id, seat_number, ticket_type FROM ticket_sales WHERE seat_number BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY game_id, seat_number;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, city FROM fan_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' AND state = 'CA' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales JOIN fan_demographics ON ticket_sales.game_id = fan_demographics.fan_id WHERE ticket_sales.ticket_price < 100 AND fan_demographics.age > 18;
SELECT DISTINCT city, state FROM fan_demographics WHERE state IN ('NY', 'TX', 'FL') ORDER BY state, city ASC;
SELECT * FROM Stadiums;
SELECT stadium_name, location FROM Stadiums ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM TicketSales WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT fan_id, age, gender FROM FanDemographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT stadium_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM TicketSales JOIN Stadiums ON TicketSales.stadium_id = Stadiums.stadium_id GROUP BY stadium_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM Stadiums;
SELECT stadium_name, location FROM Stadiums WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT stadium_name, ticket_type, sale_date, price FROM TicketSales WHERE price > 100;
SELECT fan_id, age, gender FROM FanDemographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT s.stadium_name, ts.ticket_type, fd.age FROM Stadiums s JOIN TicketSales ts ON s.stadium_id = ts.stadium_id JOIN FanDemographics fd ON s.stadium_id = fd.stadium_id;
SELECT * FROM Tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, fan_id, game_date, ticket_price FROM Tickets ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT fan_id, game_date, ticket_price FROM Tickets WHERE fan_id = 101 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, fan_id, ticket_price FROM Tickets WHERE game_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT ticket_id, game_date, ticket_price FROM Tickets INNER JOIN Fans ON Tickets.fan_id = Fans.fan_id WHERE Fans.first_name = 'John' AND Fans.last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE fan_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM Fans WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT ticket_id, game_date, ticket_price FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Fans WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM Attendance ORDER BY game_date DESC, attendance_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT fan_name, fan_age, fan_gender FROM fan_demographics WHERE fan_age > 30;
SELECT game_date, total_attendance FROM attendance_numbers WHERE game_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT stadium_name, location FROM stadium_info WHERE capacity >= 50000;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT fan_name, fan_age, fan_gender FROM fan_demographics WHERE fan_age > 25;
SELECT game_date, total_attendance FROM attendance_numbers WHERE total_attendance > 5000 ORDER BY game_date ASC;
SELECT stadium_name, capacity, location FROM stadium_info WHERE capacity >= 30000;
SELECT game_date, opposing_team FROM game_schedule WHERE game_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
